name: Mount Hill
description: A terrible accident at a nuclear test site has led to a radioactive cloud engulfing the suburbs. Mount Hill citizens got stuck at ground zero of the infection zone, and were forced into quarantine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.7 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: 2.4 GHz+ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
